text: We were deathly quiet for the first half of the year and now have so much work we canâ€™t actually do it all. Such is the way of things. You will find throughout your career that this is a problem from time to time.

Make sure you continue to take a little time away from your work, I generally find that if I spend a little time doing something else it can be quite inspirational and problems that I have been unable to solve while focussing on them can often find solutions when I go and do something like read a book for little while or go and do some exercise. Other activities can be a good way of loosening up your thought processes and providing inspiration.
